question: 親しい
sourceMnemonic: Your <kanji>parent</kanji>s are very close to you, most likely. They are your closest relatives. They are the ones who are <vocabulary>intimate</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>friendly</vocabulary> with your affairs. They want to know everything!
sourceReadingMnemonic:
Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You didn't learn that reading with this kanji, so here's a mnemonic to help you: 

Those who are most <vocabulary>intimate</vocabulary> with you hang out with you even when you're doing gross things, like sitting on the <reading>sh*tter</reading> (<ja>した</ja>). Gross, your family is.
